author: Soo Kim
title: Hundreds of Coronavirus Patients in China Wrongly Listed As 'Cured' As New Stats Show Drop in People Who Have Recovered
description: The latest figures follow a revised death toll in Wuhan, which increased the city's death count by around 50 percent.
content:
Over 900 novel coronavirus cases appear to have been wrongly counted as recoveries in Wuhan, the city where the virus was first reported, according to the latest figures from China's National Health Commission.
